title: Meeting Mr. Write
description: Librarian's Note: this is an alternate cover edition - ASIN: B00A6ROZT4Rosetta Alvez is a romance novelist….The problem is she’s a little short on romance of late.Ten months ago, Rosie was dumped in spectacular fashion when she turned up to her own wedding minus a groom. A bad case of writer’s block leaves Rosie heartbroken and humiliated with her publishers bearing down on her and she has to get out. She’s needs inspiration and decides to look for it on the other side of the world.With best friend Pippa in tow, Rosie sets off for three weeks in Thailand in search of sunshine, relaxation and inspiration. But she gets more than she bargained for when she runs into the arrogant Jackson James, a travel writer with a lust for life and beautiful women.The perpetual bachelor, JJ refuses to get close enough to anyone to fall for them, but Rosie has him hooked from day one. He fights an internal battle daily between the growing feelings for the beautiful red head and his decision to never settle down.Will Rosie ever find the inspiration that she’s looking for? Will she get her man?Only time will tell which side of Jackson will win.Currently Unavailable
author: Cassandra P. Lewis
